channel.title: Git on Miaomi
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Miaomi

item.title: Connect Git to Github
item.description: 在git bash终端创建两个SSH key: ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa_m -C "firstmail@gmail.com" #绑定hugo网站源代码存放的GitHub所用的邮箱 ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa -C "secondmail@gmail.com" #绑定另一个GitHub
